mapper.sql: id, works_id AS worksId, from_user_id AS fromUserId, to_user_id AS toUserId, relation, transfer_type AS transferType, score, `status`, reason, create_date AS createDate, update_date AS updateDate, create_by AS createBy, update_by AS updateBy, del_flag AS delFlag
mapper.select: select t.*,u1.name from_user_name,u1.head_img_url from_user_img,u2.name to_user_name,u2.head_img_url to_user_img from dd_transfer_history t join sys_app_user u1 on t.from_user_id=u1.id join sys_app_user u2 on t.to_user_id=u2.id where t.works_id=#{0} and t.del_flag=0 order by t.update_date desc
select t.* from dd_transfer_history t where t.to_user_id=#{0} or t.from_user_id=#{0}
